text:
[Verse]
Sun's up in the sky so bright
Let's dance in the morning light
Feel the warmth on our skin
Let the new day begin

[Verse 2]
Birds sing melodies so sweet
Rhythms playing with our feet
Every moment feels so fine
Walking on sunshine

[Chorus]
Oh sunny days are here
Worries disappear
Singing loud and clear
Sunny days are here

[Verse]
Clouds drift like dreams in blue
We got nothing else to do
Hold on tight let's take a ride
With the sunshine by our side

[Bridge]
Close your eyes feel the glow
Time moves gentle and slow
Every heartbeat says hello
To a world of yes and no

[Chorus]
Oh sunny days are here
Worries disappear
Singing loud and clear
Sunny days are here
title: Sunny Days
